title: New: Hugh – Look Back In Laughter
body:
Hugh raised a few heads late last year with their debut melody “[Not Fair Too Far](http://soundcloud.

com/hughlovehugh/not-fair-too-far)“, and its only a few months down the line from that muddled beginning that we see the four piece really capture their niche with this airy Balearic beat. Its minimal production and introspective air hangs halfway between a crisp spring melody and a comforting embrace for those early morning come-down sessions. Offsetting this are the paired vocals (led by Joshua Idehen of [Benin City](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/21919-new-benin-city-faithless/) renown) masterfully flowing spoken word along to the hip hop rhythm before combining into a blissed out finale. \[soundcloud url=”http://api.soundcloud.com/tracks/132163219″ iframe=”true” /\]
